verses.verse: God, <WG2316> having in the past <WG4181> spoken <WG2980> to the fathers <WG3962> through <WG1722> the prophets <WG4396> at many times <WG4181> and <WG2532> in various ways, <WG4187>

has <WG2980> at <WG1909> the end <WG2078> of these <WG3778> days <WG2250> spoken <WG2980> to us <WG2254> by <WG1722> his Son, <WG5207> whom <WG3739> he appointed <WG5087> heir <WG2818> of all things, <WG3956> through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he made <WG4160> the worlds. <WG165>

His Son <WG3739> is <WG5607> the radiance <WG541> of <WG1391> his glory, <WG1391> the <WG2532> very image <WG5481> of <WG5287> his <WG846> substance, <WG5287> and <WG5037> upholding <WG5342> all things <WG3956> by the word <WG4487> of <WG1411> his <WG846> power, <WG1411> when he had <WG4160> by <WG1223> himself <WG1438> made purification <WG2512> for our <WG2257> sins, <WG266> sat down <WG2523> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the Majesty <WG3172> on <WG1722> high; <WG5308>
having become <WG1096> so much <WG5118> better <WG2909> than the angels, <WG32> as <WG3745> he has inherited <WG2816> a more excellent <WG1313> name <WG3686> than <WG3844> they have. <WG846>

For <WG1063> to which <WG5101> of the angels <WG32> did he say <WG2036> at any time, <WG4218> "You <WG4771> are <WG1488> my <WG3450> Son. <WG5207> Today <WG4594> have <WG1080> I <WG1473> become your <WG4571> father? <WG1080>" and <WG2532> again, <WG3825> "I <WG1473> will be <WG2071> to <WG1519> him <WG846> a Father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> he <WG846> will be <WG2071> to <WG1519> me <WG3427> a Son? <WG5207>"

<WG1161> Again, <WG3825> when <WG3752> he brings <WG1521> in the firstborn <WG4416> into <WG1519> the world <WG3625> he says, <WG3004> <WG2532> "Let <WG4352> all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316> worship <WG4352> him. <WG846>"

Of <WG4314> the <WG3303> angels <WG32> he says, <WG3004> <WG3303> "Who <WG3588> makes <WG4160> his <WG846> angels <WG32> winds, <WG4151> and <WG2532> his <WG846> servants <WG3011> a flame <WG5395> of fire. <WG4442>"

But <WG1161> of <WG4314> the Son <WG5207> he says, <WG4675> "Your throne, <WG2362> O God, <WG2316> is <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> The scepter <WG4464> of uprightness <WG2118> is the scepter <WG4464> of <WG932> your <WG4675> Kingdom. <WG932>

You have loved <WG25> righteousness, <WG1343> and <WG2532> hated <WG3404> iniquity; <WG458> <WG5124> therefore <WG1223> God, <WG2316> your <WG4675> God, <WG2316> has anointed <WG5548> you <WG4571> with the oil <WG1637> of gladness <WG20> above <WG3844> your <WG4675> fellows. <WG3353>"

And, <WG2532> "You, <WG4771> Lord, <WG2962> in <WG2596> the beginning, <WG746> laid the foundation <WG2311> of the earth. <WG1093> The heavens <WG3772> are <WG1526> the works <WG2041> of <WG5495> your <WG4675> hands. <WG5495>
They <WG846> will perish, <WG622> but <WG1161> you <WG4771> continue. <WG1265> <WG2532> They all <WG3956> will grow old <WG3822> like a garment <WG2440> does. <WG5613>

<WG2532> As <WG5616> a mantle, <WG4018> you will roll <WG1667> them <WG846> up, <WG1667> and <WG2532> they will be changed; <WG236> but <WG1161> you <WG4771> are <WG1488> the same. <WG846> <WG2532> Your <WG4675> years <WG2094> will <WG1587> not <WG3756> fail. <WG1587>"

But <WG1161> which <WG5101> of <WG1161> the angels <WG32> has he told <WG2046> at any time, <WG4218> "Sit <WG2521> at my <WG3450> right hand, <WG1188> <WG302> until <WG2193> <WG99999> I make <WG5087> your <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> the footstool <WG5286> of your <WG4675> feet? <WG4228>"
